channel.title: Rune-Spice Epircus relived
channel.description:
[center][img]http://rune-spice.com/com/images/styles/blueskies/images/logo.png[/img]
[url=http://rune-spice.com/com/activity.php]http://rune-spice.com/com/activity.php[/url] [url=http://rune-spice.com/client.zip]http://rune-spice.com/client.zip[/url]
[b]Welcome to Rune-Spice. We are a community with an aim of restoring the land of Glienor; the amazing content in our game is sure to entertain any Nostalgic player who longs to re-live the 'golden age'. We have taken the time and efforts to present flawless and smooth game-play when our official server is launched.
What you see and read about below is exactly what you will experience when you log in to play Rune-Spice; even the smallest of details have been incorporated into our game to provide the same look and feel from the era that we feel was the peak of Rs2 Emulation.
We are not hear to leech Epircus, we enjoyed it and we plan to enhance it by adding more content than ever.
Grand Exchange Flawless party room Lottery Dicing Multiple world support Cross-world player list support Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently) Flawless duel arena, with staking Flawless shopping system Flawless banking system, with searching. Flawless farming system PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc Rank Icon changing system Flawless loyalty title system Flawless donator system Refined item definition system New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc. Event schedule system New character file system (credits to Lin for the format) Ingame item spawner GUI (was used for the Spawn version of Epicurus originally) Perfect curse system Weapon combination selection in duel arena[/b][/center]

item.title: Rune-Spice Epircus relived
item.dc:creator: @angelfallen angelfallen

@angelfallen wrote:

bump cause i loved epircus

item.title: Rune-Spice Epircus relived
item.dc:creator: @pure_k01 pure k0
item.description:
@pure_k01 wrote:

[center]

http://rune-spice.com/com/activity.php
http://rune-spice.com/client.zip

[b]Welcome to Rune-Spice. We are a community with an aim of restoring the land of Glienor; the amazing content in our game is sure to entertain any Nostalgic player who longs to re-live the ‘golden age’. We have taken the time and efforts to present flawless and smooth game-play when our official server is launched.

What you see and read about below is exactly what you will experience when you log in to play Rune-Spice; even the smallest of details have been incorporated into our game to provide the same look and feel from the era that we feel was the peak of Rs2 Emulation.

We are not hear to leech Epircus, we enjoyed it and we plan to enhance it by adding more content than ever.

Grand Exchange
Flawless party room
Lottery
Dicing
Multiple world support
Cross-world player list support
Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently)
Flawless duel arena, with staking
Flawless shopping system
Flawless banking system, with searching.
Flawless farming system
PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc
Rank Icon changing system
Flawless loyalty title system
Flawless donator system
Refined item definition system
New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc.
Event schedule system
New character file system (credits to Lin for the format)
Ingame item spawner GUI (was used for the Spawn version of Epicurus originally)
Perfect curse system
Weapon combination selection in duel arena[/b][/center]

Read full topic
